headline: The American Dream in Action: 2 U.S.-Based Businesses to Watch
summary: Now could be a great time to buy this pair of leaders in the U.S. steel industry.  Nucor has become one of the most important companies in this area.  Steel Dynamics is taking on and surpassing established leaders.
